thread.title: U.S. Settles Whistleblower Suit Against Altegrity
thread.title_full: U.S. Settles Whistleblower Suit Against Altegrity - WSJ

author: Patrick Fitzgerald
title: U.S. Settles Whistleblower Suit Against Altegrity
text:
The federal government has reached a settlement worth at least $30 million with Altegrity Inc., the bankrupt parent of a background-screening business that had been accused of fraud in a whistleblower lawsuit.
The U.S. Justice Department said Wednesday that Altegrity and its subsidiary U.S. Investigations Services Inc., or USIS, have agreed to a deal resolving claims that USIS raked in tens of millions of taxpayer dollars while... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
